name: Fasttracker 2 Extended Instrument File
summary: Learn about .XI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Audio tracker apps, such as Fasttracker 2 and Milkytracker, allow you to arrange patterns and instruments to create a sequence that makes up a song. The instruments may fall into many different categories, including strings, brass, woodwinds, and synths. In addition, you can adjust various settings in XI instruments, including their volume, starting note, and default panning.
NOTE: Although Triton Productions no longer develops Fasttracker 2, other audio editors still support the format.

instructions: You can open an XI file Triton Fasttracker 2 in Windows. Third-party applications, such as Milkytracker (multiplatform), Image-Line FL Studio (Windows), and FMJ-Software Awave Studio (Windows) can also open XI files.
For example, to open an XI file with Milkytracker, select LOAD in the "Instruments" section.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
